price: এতেকে ইয়াৰ পিছত যিসকলে মুখ ঘূৰাই লব, সিহঁতেই হৈছে ফাছিক (সত্যত্যাগী)।
arabic: فَمَن تَوَلَّىٰ بَعۡدَ ذَٰلِكَ فَأُوْلَٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلۡفَٰسِقُونَ

version.title: Assamese translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Assamese by Sh. Rafiqul-Islam Habib Ar-Rahman in 1438 H.

meta.transliteration: faman tawallā baʿda dhālika fa-ulāika humu al-fāsiqūna
